page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I got up at 8 o'clock in the morning. I got dressed and had breakfast then washed and brushed my teeth. I watched TVAM. Then it was time to go to school. I went the shop and got some sweeties. I fed the hens with Susan and then went to school. I go to my desk and do some sums and then English. At playtime I go and play games. Now the bell rang and after a while it is time to go for my dinner. After that I went to play hide and seek. At 2 o'clock it was time to do the hens. We got no duck eggs today. After a while we went home at half-past three. Then at 5 o'clock I went to have my tea. I did the dishes and went to play with Susan at swing ball. I went in and watched TV and at 9:30 went to bed.
